basics.name: Praful Parashar
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer specializing in backend development and system design with expertise in building scalable applications.

work.name: MakeMyTrip
work.summary: Develop and maintain high-traffic backend systems serving millions of users daily.
highlights: Designed and implemented scalable microservices architecture
Optimized database queries improving system performance
Led project for real-time analytics dashboard

work.name: UrbanPiper
work.summary: Developed backend services for restaurant management platform connecting businesses with food delivery services.
highlights: Built integration solutions with third-party delivery platforms
Implemented RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
Developed real-time order tracking and notification system

projects.name: SimplAi
projects.summary: Built a dynamic suggestive question workflow and scalable web crawling solution for enterprise hotel reviews. Technologies used: Python, Django, web crawling tools.
highlights: Reduced query resolution time by 18% and improved customer satisfaction by 12%
Extracted 10,000+ reviews/month from sources for hotels like The Leela, Taj, Hilton

projects.name: Roundup
projects.summary: Asynchronous communication tool designed to boost productivity and reduce burnout. Built with Django and other web technologies.
highlights: Improved team collaboration and reduced operational fatigue
